data.title: Riley O'Donovan - 2024 - Baseball
data.meta_description: Riley O'Donovan (19) C  - Junior (2023): Played in 40 games hitting two home runs …  hit his sixth-career round-tripper against William Peace …
data.text:
Junior (2023): Played in 40 games hitting two home runs … hit his sixth-career round-tripper against William Peace … had three RBI in season-opener against Wilmington … rocked his second home run of the season against Pfeiffer on March 14th.

Sophomore (2022): Hit .385 with a .648 slugging percentage in 32 games serving time as both the catcher and designated hitter ... hit his first-career home run against No. 9 Washington (Mo.) on Feb. 19 ... put together 10 multihit games ... ended the season on a nine-game hitting streak with 13 hits ... crushed a three-run homer in the fourth inning against Salve Regina pitcher Dominic Perachi in the NCAA tournament.

Freshman (2021): Played in 17 games ... knocked five hits with 4 RBI ... legged out one double.

Before Lynchburg: Second-Team All-Conference in the WCAC

Personal

Parents: James and Lisa

Siblings: Aidan
